name: High School Girl Cash Register
description:
Get ready for amazing High School Girl Cash Register adventure, where you will experience best school uniform shopping with high school items in a beautifully designed superstore in the well-known supermarket. Be a professional cashier at the uniform store, which has multiple sections including shirt or pants along with school bag full of items like a lunch box or geometry box and more for uniform dress up. High School Girl Cash Register provides you perfect opportunity to enhance your time management or high school cash register management skill as well as mathematical learning abilities.


High School Girl Cash Register engages you as cashier girl, which is trained to provide cash management services to customers, which do arrive in the beautifully designed superstore or realistic fashion store for uniform dress up experiencing best school uniform shopping with latest uniform store items from cashier games.

Salient Features:

- Highly colorful with beautiful fashion store environment!
- Multiple addictive levels based on cashier app simulation!
- Latest payment receiving methodologies including cash, credit card or NFC & more!
- An astonishing interface from designed helping kids in enhancing mathematical skills!
- Highly addictive kids game based play mode!
